title: Here's a reading list of 20 articles up to 2022 that cover non-autoregressive sequence generation, contrasting it with other sequence generation techniques, and exploring different ways of generating or decoding sequences
Non-autoregressive neural machine translation."** Advances in Neural Information Processing Systems
This foundational paper introduces non-autoregressive neural machine translation (NAT) and contrasts it with autoregressive models
Fast decoding in sequence models using discrete latent variables."**
Discusses a method for fast decoding in sequence models using discrete latent variables, providing a comparison with autoregressive models
Deterministic non-autoregressive neural sequence modeling by iterative
container-title: refinement."** Conference on Empirical Methods in Natural Language Processing

title: Proposes an iterative refinement approach for NAT and compares it with traditional autoregressive methods
Mask-predict
container-title: Parallel decoding of conditional masked language models."** Conference on Empirical Methods in Natural Language Processing

title: Introduces a parallel decoding method for masked language models and contrasts it with autoregressive decoding
Insertion Transformer
container-title: Flexible sequence generation via insertion operations."** International Conference on Machine Learning

title: Presents the Insertion Transformer, a flexible sequence generation model, and compares it with autoregressive and non-autoregressive models
Non-autoregressive machine
container-title: translation with auxiliary regularization."** Conference on Empirical Methods in Natural Language Processing

title: Explores auxiliary regularization techniques for improving NAT and contrasts the results with autoregressive models
Fast structured decoding for sequence models."** Advances in Neural Information Processing Systems
Discusses fast structured decoding methods and compares them with both autoregressive and non-autoregressive approaches
Non-autoregressive neural machine translation
container-title: A call for clarity."** Conference on Empirical Methods in Natural Language Processing

title: Provides a comprehensive review and analysis of NAT, highlighting the differences with autoregressive models
Non-autoregressive machine
container-title: translation with latent alignments."** Conference on Empirical Methods in Natural Language Processing

title: Introduces latent alignments in NAT and compares the performance with autoregressive models
Parallel machine translation with disentangled context transformer."**
Proposes a disentangled context transformer for parallel machine translation and contrasts it with autoregressive models
Aligned cross entropy for non-autoregressive machine translation."**
Introduces aligned cross entropy for NAT and compares it with traditional cross-entropy used in autoregressive models
Glancing transformer for non-autoregressive neural machine
container-title: translation."** Conference on Empirical Methods in Natural Language Processing

title: Proposes the Glancing Transformer for NAT and contrasts it with autoregressive models
Guiding non-autoregressive neural machine
container-title: translation decoding with reordering information."** Conference on Empirical Methods in Natural Language Processing

title: Explores the use of reordering information in NAT and compares it with autoregressive decoding
Non-autoregressive text-to-speech synthesis with conditional variational autoencoders."**
Discusses non-autoregressive text-to-speech synthesis and contrasts it with autoregressive methods
Levenshtein transformer."** Advances in Neural Information Processing Systems
Introduces the Levenshtein Transformer, a model that combines insertion and deletion operations, and compares it with autoregressive and non-autoregressive models
Variational non-autoregressive neural sequence generation."**
Proposes a variational approach to NAT and contrasts it with autoregressive models
Understanding knowledge distillation in non-autoregressive machine translation."**
Analyzes the role of knowledge distillation in NAT and compares it with autoregressive models
Latent-variable non-autoregressive neural machine translation with deterministic inference using a delta
container-title: posterior."** Conference on Empirical Methods in Natural Language Processing

title: Introduces a latent-variable approach to NAT and contrasts it with autoregressive models
Semi-autoregressive training improves non-autoregressive
container-title: translation."** Conference on Empirical Methods in Natural Language Processing

title: Proposes semi-autoregressive training for NAT and compares it with fully autoregressive and non-autoregressive models
Improving non-autoregressive neural machine
container-title: translation with monolingual data."** Conference on Empirical Methods in Natural Language Processing

title: Explores the use of monolingual data to improve NAT and contrasts the results with autoregressive models
These articles provide a comprehensive overview of the advancements in non-autoregressive sequence generation, contrasting it with autoregressive methods, and exploring various decoding strategies
